biofeedback_entry.profound: Foundation of embodied intelligence: noticing heart rate, breath, tension, and posture as live signals. Personal growth begins when the body becomes readable rather than ignored.
biofeedback_entry.synthPhrase: The body speaks in signals waiting to be heard

biofeedback_mirroring.profound: Wearables and ambient systems externalize inner states as sound, light, or motion. Consciousness grows by seeing the self from outside, collapsing blind spots.
biofeedback_mirroring.synthPhrase: See yourself from outside to collapse blind spots

biofeedback_regulation.profound: Through repeated loops, the nervous system learns to steer itself in real time. Growth becomes skillful modulation rather than forceful control.

biofeedback_habits.profound: Regulated states crystallize into habits stored in muscle memory and posture. Identity shifts as the body quietly enforces new defaults.
biofeedback_habits.synthPhrase: New habits write themselves into flesh

biofeedback_coherence.profound: At depth, body, environment, and intention synchronize as one adaptive system. Consciousness experiences regulation as effortless alignment rather than effort.
biofeedback_coherence.synthPhrase: Coherence cannot be watched, only lived
